title: Looking for dedicated team
body:
I'm looking for a dedicated team to start ranked with. I've been playing since mid 2013 (if memory serves) and have only ever played 16 ranked game, 6 in season 3 (lost all of them, I was terrible back then) and 10 within the last few days of season 4 (got placed silver 3, if memory serves). I have Teamspeak, Raidcall, Skype and Discord for voice communication. My preferred roles are ADC and Support, I'd say I'm half decent at Top and Mid, and Jungle is, by far, my worst. I want to make it clear here that I like playing Quinn (despite the changes), so unless I have a good reason to use a different ADC I'll probably pick her.

Let's be clear here, I'm looking for a *mature, friendly* team. That means if you're immature or whine about how everyone else was the reason you lost a game (or anything along those lines), don't bother because I'll just leave.

Feel free to add me in-game to discuss this further.

replies.body: Looking for a team, gold 5 support. smee007 is my name  :D

Hey I am Bronze 1 right now trying to climb but want to start a team so I can actually have some form of communication rather then pings. I main ADC and support but used to play top and I will flex it to jung if needed. I can play mid but not as good as the other 4. I'll add you and see what we can do :)
hey i main adc, currently gold 4 atm, feel free to add to discuss or somethin
Hey, I play top, support and jungle but mostly utility or tank champs rather than carry. I have skype and will add you in-game
